statements: DELETE FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = 101 AND evaluation_date <= '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluator_id = 201 AND performance_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluator_id = 301 AND performance_rating IS NULL;
DELETE FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_id = 1 AND employee_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3 AND employee_id = 1002;
DELETE FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score < 70 AND evaluation_date < DATE('2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM FeedbackHistory WHERE feedback_date < DATE('2022-03-01') AND reviewed_by = 'Manager X';
DELETE FROM PerformanceEvaluation WHERE evaluation_id = 1 AND evaluation_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Sales' AND hire_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = '67890' AND department = 'HR';
